name: .TPC File Extension
summary: Learn about .TPC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Placeholder file produced when an inter-Topicscape topic-link file is exported to Windows; allows a Topicscape to be opened at a specific topic from another Topicscape file.

content: The contents of a TPC file can be viewed in a text editor.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
